text: The 2018 FIBA U18 Women's European Championship was an international basketball competition that was held from 4 to 12 August 2018 in Italy. It was the 35th edition of the championship. 16 national teams from across Europe, composed of women aged 18 and under, competed in the tournament. ==Venues== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! colspan="2" |Udine |rowspan="4"| |- |Palasport Primo Carnera |Palasport Manlio Benedetti |- |Capacity: 3,300 |Capacity: 2,000 |} ==Participating teams== * * * * * * (Winners, 2017 FIBA Europe Women's Under-18 Championship Division B) * * (Runners-up, 2017 FIBA Europe Women's Under-18 Championship Division B) * (Host) * * (Third place, 2017 FIBA Europe Women's Under-18 Championship Division B) * * * * * ==First round== The first-round groups draw took place on 16 January 2018 in Freising, Germany.Youth Europe Championships Draw All times are local (UTC+2). ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ===Group C=== ===Group D=== ==Final round== ===Bracket=== == Final ranking == {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| || Qualified for the 2019 FIBA Under-19 Women's Basketball World Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor="#ffcccc"| || Relegated to the 2019 FIBA Under-18 Women's European Championship Division B |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !
